title: FT/FS: Crandall no cap EPDG SGC 40 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Crandall no cap EPDG SGC 40 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
PENDING

Have this pair of SGC graded EPDGs available for trade or sale. Would be looking for other EPDGs graded PSA 2.5 and better and can do cash either way. Available via PM to discuss.

$SOLD Crandall no cap - tough card, low pop
$SOLD Powell - the only horizontal EPDG!  

Thanks!

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2kzu6tD][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/50918397063_85af2a3536_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2kzyijo][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/50919217342_2d8e70ab7a_b.jpg[/img][/url]

If still available; I'll take the Powell.
RayB
